data.title: 以 1 到 3 分钟谈论以下主题
data.content: Name something you learned this year that has made you wiser. Who taught you this, and how has it improved your life? How will you share your new wisdom with others?
data.answer: The most important thing that I have learned this year is always try to listen to others. One of my best friends, who is always the most popular person in any groups shares this wisdom with me, and I hope I will share this to other friends of mine one day by showing them the many benefits of listening. Good listening isn't something that we should limit to authority figures. It's something you can do with everyone you encounter: your friends, your family, and new people in your life. Effective listening offers you many benefits and encourages the speaker to feel valued as well. Being a good listener has improved my life significantly. There's the practical side – you can't do well academically if you don't pay attention to instructions, you'll get in trouble at home if you drown out your parents when they're laying down the rules. Good listening connects me to the world around me and helps me understand my responsibilities. (162 words)
